smarterAppMetadata.Subject: ELA
smarterAppMetadata.EvidenceStatement: The student will write full arguments about topics or sources, attending to purpose and audience: establish and support a claim, organize and cite supporting evidence from credible sources, provide appropriate transitional strategies for coherence, and develop a conclusion that is appropriate to purpose and audience and follows from and supports the argument(s) presented.
